query.name: com.txoof.brightspace.enroll.08_teacher
query.sql: select distinct 'enrollment' as "type", 'UPDATE' as "action", 'T_'||TEACHERS.ID as "child_code", 'Instructor' as "role_name", 'cs_'||CC.SCHOOLID||'_'||cc.COURSE_NUMBER||'_'||CC.TERMID||'_'||DECODE(substr(cc.expression, 1, 1), 1, 'A', 2, 'B', 3, 'C', 4, 'D', 5, 'E', 6, 'F', 7, 'G', 8, 'H', 9, 'ADV', 'UNKNOWN') as "parent_code" from CC CC, STUDENTS STUDENTS, TEACHERS TEACHERS where CC.STUDENTID=STUDENTS.ID and CC.TEACHERID=TEACHERS.ID and STUDENTS.ENROLL_STATUS =0 and TEACHERS.STATUS =1 and cc.termid >= case when (EXTRACT(month from sysdate) >= 1 and EXTRACT(month from sysdate) <= 7) THEN (EXTRACT(year from sysdate)-2000+9)*100 when (EXTRACT(month from sysdate) > 7 and EXTRACT(month from sysdate) <= 12) THEN (EXTRACT(year from sysdate)-2000+10)*100 end order by "child_code" asc, "parent_code" asc
